description: I2EDC (Institute Innovation & Entrepreneurship Development Club) is a student-led community that encourages innovation, creativity, and entrepreneurship on campus. It’s a space where ideas come to life — from brainstorming new concepts to turning them into real projects and startups. Our club helps students explore, experiment, and learn by doing. Whether you’re building a prototype, pitching an idea, or just curious about innovation, I2EDC is the place to start. We believe in learning by creating — from ideas to innovation.
